name: Street Racing
description: Your reputation in the underground racing scene

description.heading: Entre Amigos / Among Friends
description.description: Racing just for the joy of it.

unlocks.heading: Basic Street Races
unlocks.description: Access to beginner street races and circuits.

en.name: Among Friends
en.intro:
It starts without spotlights or applause.
Just old cars, familiar roads, and people racing for the simple joy of it.
No one talks about reputation yet.
en.completion: You're not racing to win. You're racing to learn how not to lose.

es.name: Entre Amigos
es.intro:
Todo empieza sin focos ni aplausos.
Solo coches viejos, carreteras conocidas y gente que corre por el simple placer de hacerlo.
Aquí nadie habla de reputación. Todavía.
es.completion: No corres para ganar. Corres para aprender a no perder.

description.heading: Polvo y Asfalto / Dust and Asphalt

unlocks.heading: Rally & Dirt Races
unlocks.description: Access to rally stages and dirt circuits.

en.name: Dust and Asphalt
en.intro:
Races are no longer improvised.
There are rules, there are routes… and people watching.
Winning starts to matter.
en.completion: Luck runs out. Skill is what remains.

es.name: Polvo y Asfalto
es.intro:
Las carreras ya no son improvisadas.
Hay reglas, hay recorridos… y hay gente mirando.
Ganar empieza a importar.
es.completion: La suerte se acaba. Lo que queda es habilidad.

unlocks.heading: Track Racing & Drag
unlocks.description: Access to professional tracks and drag strips.

en.name: Blurred Lines
en.intro:
As the money grows, the rules start to fade.
Nights get longer, cars get faster, and mistakes become expensive.
Not everyone plays fair anymore.
en.completion: Not everyone racing wants to finish first.

es.name: Límites Difusos
es.intro:
Cuando el dinero aumenta, las normas se vuelven borrosas.
Las noches son más largas, los coches más rápidos, y los errores más caros.
Aquí ya no todos juegan limpio.
es.completion: No todo el que corre quiere llegar primero.

description.heading: Underground
description.description: Where legends are born… or broken.

unlocks.heading: Underground Scene
unlocks.description: Access to drift, touge, and underground events.

en.name: Into the Underground
en.intro:
There's a world beneath the surface.
No clear rules. No trophies.
Just headlights in the dark and the rush of risking everything.
This is where legends are born… or broken.
en.completion: You earned their respect. But respect doesn't win races. Speed does.

es.name: Hacia el Underground
es.intro:
Hay un mundo bajo el mundo.
Sin reglas claras. Sin trofeos.
Solo faros en la oscuridad y la adrenalina de arriesgarlo todo.
Aquí es donde nacen las leyendas… o se rompen.
es.completion: Te has ganado su respeto. Pero el respeto no gana carreras. La velocidad sí.

unlocks.heading: The Big One
unlocks.description: The legendary race your grandfather dreamed of.

en.name: The Big One
en.intro:
Everything leads here.
Every night, every part, every risk taken.
There are no second chances.
en.completion: Do it right. Don't look back.

es.name: The Big One
es.intro:
Todo conduce hasta aquí.
Cada noche, cada pieza, cada riesgo asumido.
No hay segundas oportunidades.
